title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Patching data leak vulnerabilities using VPC Egress Proxy (NET216)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] 使用 VPC 出口代理修补数据泄露漏洞 (NET216)
abstract: Cyber attackers are becoming sophisticated. Through leaked credentials and elevated IAM roles, they can compromise workloads and exfiltrate data while remaining undetected for extended periods. In this session, discover how AWS Network Firewall proxy provides advanced protection against sophisticated cyber threats. You’ll learn how this new feature patches data leak vulnerabilities in your environment, helping detect and prevent unauthorized data exfiltration attempts. We’ll deep dive into ways to identify compromised workloads that may be operating with stolen credentials or escalated IAM privileges, demonstrate practical implementation strategies, and share best practices for configuring inspection policies to strengthen your organization's security posture.
abstract_cn: 网络攻击者正变得越来越复杂。通过泄露的凭证和提升的IAM角色，他们可以入侵工作负载并窃取数据，同时在较长时间内保持不被发现。在本次会议中，了解AWS网络防火墙代理如何提供针对复杂网络威胁的高级保护。您将学习这一新功能如何修补环境中的数据泄露漏洞，帮助检测和防止未经授权的数据窃取尝试。我们将深入探讨识别可能使用被盗凭证或升级IAM权限运行的受损工作负载的方法，演示实际实施策略，并分享配置检查策略的最佳实践，以加强您组织的安全态势。
